endpoints.name: Create Interaction Response
endpoints.description:
Create a response to an Interaction from the gateway. Takes an [interaction response](#DOCS_INTERACTIONS_RECEIVING_AND_RESPONDING/interaction-response-object).
This endpoint also supports file attachments similar to the webhook endpoints. Refer to [Uploading Files](#DOCS_REFERENCE/uploading-files) for details on uploading files and `multipart/form-data` requests.

endpoints.name: Get Original Interaction Response
endpoints.description: Returns the initial Interaction response. Functions the same as [Get Webhook Message](#DOCS_RESOURCES_WEBHOOK/get-webhook-message).

endpoints.name: Edit Original Interaction Response
endpoints.description: Edits the initial Interaction response. Functions the same as [Edit Webhook Message](#DOCS_RESOURCES_WEBHOOK/edit-webhook-message).

endpoints.name: Delete Original Interaction Response
endpoints.description: Deletes the initial Interaction response. Returns `204 No Content` on success.

endpoints.name: Create Followup Message
endpoints.description: Create a followup message for an Interaction. Functions the same as [Execute Webhook](#DOCS_RESOURCES_WEBHOOK/execute-webhook), but `wait` is always true, and `flags` can be set to `64` in the body to send an ephemeral message. The `thread_id`, `avatar_url`, and `username` parameters are not supported when using this endpoint for interaction followups.

endpoints.name: Get Followup Message
endpoints.description: Returns a followup message for an Interaction. Functions the same as [Get Webhook Message](#DOCS_RESOURCES_WEBHOOK/get-webhook-message). Does not support ephemeral followups.

endpoints.name: Edit Followup Message
endpoints.description: Edits a followup message for an Interaction. Functions the same as [Edit Webhook Message](#DOCS_RESOURCES_WEBHOOK/edit-webhook-message). Does not support ephemeral followups.

endpoints.name: Delete Followup Message
endpoints.description: Deletes a followup message for an Interaction. Returns `204 No Content` on success. Does not support ephemeral followups.
